channel.title: yochan on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in yochan on Barefoot Rob

item.title: muchan and yochan lessons
item.description: 21:48 Tuesday 21 July 2015 JST Nice lessons with Y and M today. Y is getting better at speaking, though sometimes I wonder if I push her too hard. Muchan always does great homework so it’s a lovely breeze to help her out because she has tons of material to check and practice, though she’s loathe to speak, so I usually just end up checking her homework.
